message.body: Hey i quickly grabbed sentence strips out of the closet before i left. I wanted to make labels for the math bins. They are the new pack of bright strips.
Do you mind if i use them?
Thanks! I'm going to head to lakeshore tomorrow. If you can think of anything we might need, let me know. I'm going to Michaels to pick up more felt today.
I just remembered that there might be two paras this year. ##### has a health para, and steve might have his own ... We only have 3 frogs.
I can make another on Tuesday - but I guess we'd need to put two frogs on one lily pad then
Yup, that sounds like a good idea
